remarks: The image of ` 1 ` by the ` QQHom ` homomorphism is the ring's unit. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
statement:

qqhval2.2 $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
qqh1 $p |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) -> ( ( QQHom ` R ) ` 1 ) = ( 1r ` R ) ) $.
